info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 06 at 3:39AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Rain to Wet Snow During Today`s Morning Commute.... Rain is expected to mix with and change to wet snow this morning in the Berkshires and the Connecticut River Valley of southern Vermont resulting in slippery travel conditions. While a total of one to three inches of wet snow is expected to accumulate, most of the wet snow should stick to cooler and grassy surfaces due to marginal surface temperatures in the low to mid 30s. However, a period of moderate snow may occur this morning which could allow coatings of wet snow to stick to any untreated roads. Motorists are encouraged to use caution through today`s morning commute and allow extra travel time.
